allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Feature Flags & A/B Testing (position 10/13)

Complete feature flag system with gradual rollouts and A/B testing.

Core Service (180 LOC):
- FeatureFlag: flag configuration with rollout percentage
- Variant: A/B test variant definition
- ABTest: A/B test management
- FeatureFlagManager: flag evaluation and management
- FeatureFlagService: high-level API

Features:
- Global flag enable/disable
- Gradual rollout (0-100%)
- User targeting (whitelist)
- Consistent user hashing (same user, same outcome)
- A/B test variant assignment
- Multiple rollout strategies (immediate, canary, blue-green, gradual)
- JSONL persistence
- Evaluation logging
- Thread-safe operations

Evaluation Algorithm:
- Check enabled status
- Check user targeting
- Check rollout percentage (consistent hashing)
- All must pass for flag to be enabled

A/B Testing:
- Configurable variants with weights
- Consistent variant assignment per user
- Variant configs for experimentation
- Weights must sum to 1.0

Test Suite (27 tests, 100% passing):
- Feature flag creation and evaluation
- Enable/disable operations
- Rollout percentage control
- User targeting
- Consistent assignment
- A/B test creation and variant assignment
- Variant distribution validation
- Rollout strategies
- High-level service API

Coverage: 93%
